file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 05-40-04-07 - EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE REAR FUSELAGE I LOWER SIDE - CLEANING/PAINTING

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE REAR FUSELAGE I LOWER SIDE - CLEANING/PAINTING EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to clean the EWIS components and lines at rear fuselage I, lower side. B. Zones: 171/172. C. Zone Boundaries ( AMM MPP 06-41-00/100 AMM MPP 06-41-00/100). D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE REAR FU- ALL 05-40-04-100-801-A ♦ SELAGE I (LOWER SIDE) - CLEANING EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 05-40-04 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 05-40-04-100-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE REAR FUSELAGE I (LOWER SIDE) - CLEANING A. General (1) This procedure obeys the EWIS ICA requirement. (2) This task gives the instructions to do SMRD Task Number: 20-00-00-140-005-A00. (3) You must clean the EWIS components and lines at rear fuselage I, zones 171/172, between frame 60 and frame 76. (4) Do not unlace or displace the electrical wiring and components during the cleaning procedure. (5) Do not disconnect the electrical connectors, during the cleaning procedures. If you find contamination, clean only the exposed areas. (6) Refer to the Preparation subtask for access panel information. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - AMM MPP 06-41-02/100 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-803-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-803-A/400 - BAGGAGE-COMPARTMENT FLOOR PANELS - RE- AMM TASK 53-01-03-000-801-A/400 MOVAL BAGGAGE-COMPARTMENT FLOOR PANELS - IN- AMM TASK 53-01-03-400-801-A/400 STALLATION REAR ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT FLOOR PAN- AMM TASK 53-01-04-000-801-A/400 ELS - REMOVAL REAR ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT FLOOR PAN- AMM TASK 53-01-04-400-801-A/400 ELS - INSTALLATION WM 20-21-00 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION Baggage compartment and rear elec- 271 tronic compartment - LH Baggage compartment and rear elec- 272 tronic compartment - RH EMB-145 - AMM 1285 100-801-A/700 05-40-04 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (Continued) ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Fuselage rear section I - RH D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Standard Ladder To get access to the area Standard Vacuum cleaner To clean the area E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Cloth, Lint-Free To clean the area AR available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Rear fuselage I - lower side I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Put the ladder in position. (2) Get access to the cargo compartment. (3) Open access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100) to get access to the rear electronic compartment. (4) Identify the baggage-compartment and rear-electronic-compartment floor panels of rear fuselage I, at sub-zone 270 (AMM MPP 06-41-02/100), that give access to zones 171/172. (5) Remove the baggage-compartment floor panels from rear fuselage I, at sub-zone 270 ( AMM TASK 53-01-03-000-801-A/400) to access zones 171/172. (6) Remove the rear electronic compartment floor panels from rea r fuselage I, at sub- zone 270 (AMM TASK 53-01-04-000-801-A/400) to access zones 171/172. (7) Remove, if necessary, the thermoacoustic insulation from rear fuselage I, at zones 171/172 (AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-801-A/400, AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-802-A/400 or AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-803-A/400, as applicable). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 100-801-A/700 05-40-04 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. EWIS Components in the Rear Fuselage I (Lower Side) - Cleaning (Figure 701) SUBTASK 160-002-A (1) The cleaning procedure of this task is applicable to specified components or assemblies of an area/zone. (2) Do the cleaning procedure as follows: (a) Use a vacuum cleaner and/or a clean and dry cloth to remove the particles from the area below rear fuselage I and lines. (b) If you find contamination, clean the EWIS components. Refer to WM 20-21-00, Section Cleaning Procedures. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) If you removed the thermoacoustic insulation, install it back at zones 171/172 (AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-801-A/400, AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-802-A/400 or AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-803-A/400), as applicable. (2) Install the rear-electronic-compartment floor panels to rear fuselage I, at sub-zone 270 (AMM TASK 53-01-04-400-801-A/400), related to zones 171/172. (3) Install the baggage-compartment floor panels to rear fuselage I, at sub-zone 270 ( AMM TASK 53-01-03-400-801-A/400), related to zones 171/172. (4) Install access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (5) Remove the ladder. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 100-801-A/700 05-40-04 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
